name: Propelled
description:
Description

Propelled is a relaxing and enjoyable game that offers a unique and immersive experience.

To navigate this world, you must activate your propellers using a switch. You'll need to use your propellers strategically to avoid falling off the platforms and reach new areas of the world. Once the propellers are up and running, you can take off and soar through the world.

The game's world consists of numerous floating platforms that you can use to move around. You'll need to use your propellers strategically to avoid falling off the platforms and reach new areas of the world. The game offers a range of challenging obstacles and hurdles, which will require your wits and quick reflexes to overcome. With a single live this is an interesting challenge!

If you're looking for a game that allows you to explore a fascinating world using powerful propellers, then Propelled is the game for you.

Note: The web version might experience some audio sync  issues.

Controls GeneralMute all audio MToggle color palettePGameWalk left
A, left arrow
Walk right
D, right arrow
JumpSpace, up arrow
AttackE Palettes
Palette 1 - Default The default colors used for the gamePalette 2 - Gray A darker palette, easier on the eyes in darker environmentsPalette 3 - Amber A different retro color palettePalette 4 - Blue-ish A darker palette, easier on the eyes in darker environmentsPalette 5 - Harsh A different retro color palette
